FieldDef.name: in_cracking_indicators_rule_employerphone_pct
FieldDef.Description: Percentage of number of request that were found by Rules for matching for Cracking_EmployerPhone with hard decline (es_type_of_decision=1) (select (1-PERCENT_RANK(1) WITHIN GROUP (order by es_type_of_decision DESC NULLS FIRST )) from cracking ...). Values range in es buffer is [0..1]. For DiliGenSe it's sent as money (13% = 0,13 (DRools) = 13 (es buffer)).
